scripts.starksetup: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js -c build/fibonacci.const -p build/fibonacci.pil -s src/fibonacci.starkstruct.json -t build/fibonacci.consttree -v build/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.starkprove: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js -m build/fibonacci.commit -c build/fibonacci.const -t build/fibonacci.consttree -p build/fibonacci.pil -s src/fibonacci.starkstruct.json -o build/proof.json -z build/proof.zkin.json -b build/public.json --proverAddr 0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.starkverify: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js -p build/fibonacci.pil -s src/circuit.starkstruct.json -v build/fibonacci.verkey.json -o build/proof.json -b build/public.json
